text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item specifications and item specification information.

Item specification:
ShelterLogic Firewood Rack and Cover - 4Ft.L, 1/4-Cord Capacity, Model# 90463

Item specifications:
Full-length 7.5 oz. polyethylene Rip-Stop Tough Cover protects wood from inclement weather
Long-lasting 1 1/8in steel tube frame with DuPont premium powder-coat finish
Easy to assemble with quick-connect swedged tube design
Cover has double-zipper closure
48 x 12 x 40 1/2 inches
600 lbs capacity

Product description:
text.Response A: The ShelterLogic Firewood Rack and Cover - 4Ft.L, 1/4-Cord Capacity, Model# 90463 has a long-lasting 1 1/8in steel tube frame with DuPont premium powder-coat finish and a 600 lbs capacity.  It has a full-length 7.5 oz. rip-stop polyethylene cover that protects wood from the elements and has a double-zipper closure. The cover is designed to be UV treated and is fade resistant. This unit is easy to assemble with quick-connect swedged tube design which requires no tools. Item dimensions are 48 x 12 x 40 1/2 inches.
text.Response B: This ShelterLogic Firewood Rack and Cover has a 4ft.L, 1/4-Cord capacity, model# 90463. It has a full-length 7.5 oz. rip-stop polyethylene cover that protects wood from inclement weather. The cover has a double-zipper closure. The unit is easy to assemble with a quick-connect swedged tube design and has a long-lasting 1 1/8in steel tube frame with DuPont premium powder-coat finish. It has a capacity of 600 lbs. Dimensions: 48 x 12 x 40 1/2 inches.

meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

545.displayed_text:
Prompt

You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item specifications and item specification information.

Item specification:
ShelterLogic Firewood Rack and Cover - 4Ft.L, 1/4-Cord Capacity, Model# 90463

Item specifications:
Full-length 7.5 oz. polyethylene Rip-Stop Tough Cover protects wood from inclement weather
Long-lasting 1 1/8in steel tube frame with DuPont premium powder-coat finish
Easy to assemble with quick-connect swedged tube design
Cover has double-zipper closure
48 x 12 x 40 1/2 inches
600 lbs capacity

Product description:

Response A

The ShelterLogic Firewood Rack and Cover - 4Ft.L, 1/4-Cord Capacity, Model# 90463 has a long-lasting 1 1/8in steel tube frame with DuPont premium powder-coat finish and a 600 lbs capacity. It has a full-length 7.5 oz. rip-stop polyethylene cover that protects wood from the elements and has a double-zipper closure. The cover is designed to be UV treated and is fade resistant. This unit is easy to assemble with quick-connect swedged tube design which requires no tools. Item dimensions are 48 x 12 x 40 1/2 inches.

Response B

This ShelterLogic Firewood Rack and Cover has a 4ft.L, 1/4-Cord capacity, model# 90463. It has a full-length 7.5 oz. rip-stop polyethylene cover that protects wood from inclement weather. The cover has a double-zipper closure. The unit is easy to assemble with a quick-connect swedged tube design and has a long-lasting 1 1/8in steel tube frame with DuPont premium powder-coat finish. It has a capacity of 600 lbs. Dimensions: 48 x 12 x 40 1/2 inches.
